thread.title: Mother's Day afternoon tea-terrible
thread.title_full: Mother's Day afternoon tea-terrible - Review of St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ninachesterton
title: Mother's Day afternoon tea-terrible
text: I have just returned from afternoon tea at your hotel. I booked online the Hansom Lounge and were instead put in the utterly depressing 'royal suite'. It's obviously a multi purpose venue which was dressed for a wedding, but had no decorations anywhere, not even a tulip insight. There was no atmosphere, service was poor and we were served cold tea! Cakes were nice, but overall, terrible, 6/10. It was £38 pp and I wouldn't pay more than £7 out of choice.
